game.name: Dub Dash
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dub Dash is a fast-paced rhythm based action game including music from Bossfight and the DJs of Geometry Dash. Spin your crazy wheel in harmony with the song and keep dodging left and right avoiding obstacles at high speed. Do you rock the funky roads of Dub Dash?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dub Dash is a fast-paced rhythm based action game including music from Bossfight and the DJs of Geometry Dash. Spin your crazy wheel in harmony with the song and keep dodging left and right avoiding obstacles at high speed. Do you rock the funky roads of Dub Dash?

reviewHighlights.text: It is a lot like Geometry Dash except in 3rd person view and going quite fast. Not for beginners. Once you lose enough you lose your extra lives and t...
